xwikidoc.title: Space Used
xwikidoc.content:
The following page shows the space used in MegaBytes by usually biggest tables.
__xwikirecyclebin__ : Here is store the deleted documents. You can shrink the recycle bin [[here>>Admin.ShrinkRecycleBins]]. __xwikircs__ : Versioning of documents.
{{warning}}The following tables will not be shown if you're using [[Filesystem Attachment feature>>http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Attachments#HFilesystemAttachmentStore]].{{/warning}} __xwikiattachment_content__ : Stores the content of attachments in database. __xwikiattachment_archive__ : Versioning of attachments __xwikiattrecyclebin__ : Recycle bin of attachments.
{{velocity}}
